resources.string: Please read the instructions carefully and complete the installation

To compensate for the shortcomings of the theme engine, Samsung has implemented the Theme Park feature in a strange way, including post-processing and compression of the icons in the icon pack.\nTherefore, the only way to bypass the Theme Park limitation and retain the adaptive icons feature is to install it according to our tutorial. Any other form of installation is not recommended and is not supported.
Maybe you need to watch the tutorial again
View all icons included in this icon pack
The latest version of the icon pack has been installed. Everything works fine!
The installed icon package is outdated, we recommend you to update to the latest version.
It looks like you don\'t have this icon package installed yet, please follow the installation tutorial to install it first.
Go to Theme Store to manage all icon packs and themes
You can enter an app package name or a share link from the Samsung Theme Store

Please read the following carefully!

This icon pack is just an adaptive icon pack, there is no function code, no process, no any modification or optimization to the operating system, the final result depends entirely on your device and operating system.
This application only serves to make the installation of the icon pack easier and you can completely uninstall it after installation.
If you feel that your device is getting hot, dropping frames, lagging, etc. during installation and use, and you are convinced that it is the effect of this icon pack after reading the above, please uninstall this application and the icon pack as soon as possible.
Install icon pack from theme store
Direct installation is not recognized by the theme store. Please install this icon pack as a placeholder.
The Theme Store already has a record of this icon pack, uninstall it and replace it with this icon pack.
Your authorization may be required to install the application package.
After clearing the cache, the theme store will show the preview image of this icon pack correctly.
Go to the theme store to apply this icon pack.
This step is not required, but we strongly recommend that you reboot your system after each application of the icon pack.
Why not give us a five-star review?
An open source icon pack dashboard
An open source icon pack dashboard, specialised for Samsung. The code is badly written, do not say it!
Theme or icon pack is not installed
Please do not apply themes or icon packs
Due to system limitations, we are unable to reboot directly, please continue to complete the operation.
QR code has been saved to the system album
There is a problem with saving the application. Please contact the author for support.
QQ is not installed or the installed version is not supported
AliPay is not installed or the installed version is not supported
WeChat is not installed or the installed version is not supported
If you want to uninstall this icon pack completely, you also need to go to the theme store to remove it.
